alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Franklin; Union; Wayne (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 13 at 5:31PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN WAYNE AND UNION COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA, NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN COUNTY IN SOUTHEASTERN INDIANA, FAYETTE COUNTY IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA, SOUTHEASTERN SHELBY, PREBLE AND WESTERN CHAMPAIGN COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, NORTHWESTERN BUTLER COUNTY IN SOUTHWESTERN OHIO, SOUTHWESTERN LOGAN, SOUTHEASTERN DARKE, NORTHWESTERN CLARK, NORTHERN MONTGOMERY AND MIAMI COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 615 PM EST... At 530 PM EST, snow showers were located along a line extending from near De Graff to 7 miles southeast of Glenwood, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Rapidly changing visibility and up to half an inch of snow accumulation. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Driving conditions may change quickly. Slick roads are possible. Locations impacted include... Dayton, Huber Heights, Richmond, Troy, Trotwood, Oxford, Sidney, Piqua, Vandalia, Connersville, Englewood, Urbana, Tipp City, Eaton, New Carlisle, West Milton, Covington, Liberty, Arcanum and St. Paris. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Indiana between mile markers 154 and 156. I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 38. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 59 and 90.
info.instruction: Exercise extra caution while traveling. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
